text: Rolandz is a dansband from Sweden. It was established in 2008 by Robert Gustafsson. They first became successful during a Dansbandskampen break appearance in 2008. In 2009, the band participated at Allsång på Skansen on 7 July 2009. The singer and leader of Rolandz is the character Roland Järverup, whom Robert Gustafsson played in the 1999 movie Screwed in Tallinn by Killinggänget. The idea to create Rolandz using the Roland Järverup character was developed later. ==Discography== ===Albums=== Year Album Peak positions Certification SWE 2009 Efter regn kommer solsken 3 2010 Jajamen 1 2011 Halleluja mamma 6 2013 Pâ riktigt: Party & Pineappleband 21 ==DVDs== *2009: Rolandz – the Movie *2010: Rolandz danzar igen *2011: Rolandz – Fadersjakten ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2008 establishments in Europe Category:Dansbands Category:Swedish musical groups Category:2000s establishments in Sweden
